column1: Kata Robata////Came here on date night with the fianc√© and we were in love with this place. It had been a long time since we found a restaurant that we both love in Houston. It felt like something we would experience on a vacation and not within our city limits. Anyway
column2: we made reservation thru Yelp on our way there but for some reason it didn't show up in their system so we had to wait a little bit for our table. Our waiter was extremely friendly
column4: and helpful. After spending about 15 mins on Yelp and still not knowing what to order
column5: we asked our waiter for recommendations and pretty much ordered everything based on his recommendations.
